text: @NYGovCuomo All cows will be handed over to the state, we will then sell you back the milk at a price that I set which will be fair to all New Yorkers in order to fill our coolers, I mean coffers with cash because coronavirus has killed so many in our nursing homes

domain.name: Person

domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
